definition: powder containing gypsum plaster and glue, that when mixed with water forms a plastic paste used to fill cracks and holes in plaster
details:
noun
- powder containing gypsum plaster and glue, that when mixed with water forms a plastic paste used to fill cracks and holes in plaster
= example: powder containing gypsum plaster and glue, that when mixed with water forms a plastic paste used to fill cracks and holes in plaster
= synonyms: spackling compound
